message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its exceptional features and the value it brings, I'm extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $15000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you. Let's discuss how we can make this a mutually beneficial transaction.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality you've described, $15000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. This is my top offer, and I believe it's a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on this product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $12500 for the product. This offer includes a special discount for your consideration, reflecting the value you see in the product while also accommodating your budget constraints. I look forward to your feedback on this proposal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $12500 is still slightly above my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $11000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product while staying within my financial constraints.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your budgetary constraints and am willing to accommodate them. In light of your latest offer, I propose a final price of $11500 for the product. This price includes a slight discount compared to my initial offer, while still reflecting the value and quality of the product. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to reach a satisfactory agreement.
